verses.verse: There is <S%G686>therefore<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G3762>no<s%> <S%G2631>condemnation<s%> to them that <S%G3588>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1659>made<s%> <S%G3165>me<s%> <S%G1659>free<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of <S%G2288>death<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G3588>what<s%> the <S%G3551>law<s%> could not <S%G102>do<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> it was <S%G770>weak<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3992>sending<s%> his <S%G1438>own<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G3667>likeness<s%> of <S%G266>sinful<s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4012>for<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>, <S%G2632>condemned<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>:

that <S%G2443><s%> the <S%G1345>ordinance<s%> of the <S%G3551>law<s%> might be <S%G4137>fulfilled<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%>, who <S%G4043>walk<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> they that <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G5426>mind<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> they that are <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> the <S%G3588>things<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G5427>the<s%> <S%G5427>mind<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G2288>death<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G5427>the<s%> <S%G5427>mind<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> is <S%G2222>life<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1515>peace<s%>:

because <S%G1360><s%> the <S%G5427>mind<s%> of the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> is <S%G2189>enmity<s%> <S%G1519>against<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>; <S%G1063>for<s%> it <S%G5293>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5293>subject<s%> to the <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> <S%G1063>indeed<s%> can it <S%G1410>be<s%>:
and <S%G1161><s%> they that <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G1410>cannot<s%> <S%G700>please<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G2075>are<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%> <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, if so be <S%G1512>that<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3611>dwelleth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>. <S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> <S%G2192>hath<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>none<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> is <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, the <S%G4983>body<s%> is <S%G3498>dead<s%> because <S%G1223>of<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> is <S%G2222>life<s%> because <S%G1223>of<s%> <S%G1343>righteousness<s%>.

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of him that raised <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G3611>dwelleth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>, he that raised <S%G1453>up<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> Jesus <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G3498>dead<s%> <S%G2227>shall<s%> give <S%G2227>life<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> to <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2349>mortal<s%> <S%G4983>bodies<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> that <S%G1774>dwelleth<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%>.
So <S%G3767><s%> <S%G80>then<s%>, brethren, we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G3781>debtors<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> to the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, to <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>:

for <S%G1063><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> ye <S%G2198>live<s%> <S%G2596>after<s%> the <S%G4561>flesh<s%>, ye <S%G3195>must<s%> <S%G599>die<s%>; <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2289>ye<s%> put to <S%G2289>death<s%> the <S%G4234>deeds<s%> of the <S%G4983>body<s%>, ye shall <S%G2198>live<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> as many <S%G3745>as<s%> are <S%G71>led<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G1526>are<s%> <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> <S%G2983>ye<s%> <S%G2983>received<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G1397>bondage<s%> <S%G3825>again<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> <S%G5401>fear<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> ye <S%G2983>received<s%> the <S%G4151>spirit<s%> of <S%G1722>adoption<s%>, <S%G3739>whereby<s%> we <S%G2896>cry<s%>, <S%G5>Abba<s%>, <S%G3962>Father<s%>.
The <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> beareth witness <S%G4828>with<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4151>spirit<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> we <S%G2070>are<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>:

and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%>, <S%G2532>then<s%> <S%G2818>heirs<s%>; <S%G2818>heirs<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G4789>joint-heirs<s%> with <S%G5547>Christ<s%>; if so be <S%G1512>that<s%> we suffer <S%G4841>with<s%> <S%G2443>him<s%>, that we may <S%G4888>be<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> glorified with <S%G4888>him<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I <S%G3049>reckon<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3804>sufferings<s%> <S%G2540>of<s%> this <S%G3568>present<s%> <S%G2540>time<s%> are <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G514>worthy<s%> to be compared <S%G4314>with<s%> the <S%G1391>glory<s%> which <S%G3195>shall<s%> be <S%G601>revealed<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2248>us-ward<s%>.
For <S%G1063><s%> the earnest <S%G603>expectation<s%> of the <S%G2937>creation<s%> waiteth <S%G553>for<s%> the <S%G602>revealing<s%> of the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> the <S%G2937>creation<s%> was <S%G5293>subjected<s%> to <S%G3153>vanity<s%>, <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1223>of<s%> its own <S%G235>will<s%>, but by reason <S%G1223>of<s%> him who <S%G5293>subjected<s%> <S%G1909>it<s%>, in <S%G1680>hope<s%>

that <S%G3754><s%> the <S%G2937>creation<s%> <S%G846>itself<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> shall be <S%G1659>delivered<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G1397>bondage<s%> of <S%G5356>corruption<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G1657>liberty<s%> of the <S%G1391>glory<s%> of the <S%G5043>children<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G2937>creation<s%> <S%G4959>groaneth<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> travaileth in pain <S%G4944>together<s%> <S%G891>until<s%> <S%G3568>now<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%> <S%G235>so<s%>, but <S%G846>ourselves<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%>, who <S%G2192>have<s%> the <S%G536>first-fruits<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> <S%G2249>we<s%> <S%G846>ourselves<s%> <S%G4727>groan<s%> <S%G1722>within<s%> <S%G1438>ourselves<s%>, waiting <S%G553>for<s%> our <S%G5206>adoption<s%>, to <S%G629>wit<s%>, the redemption <S%G4983>of<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G4983>body<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1680>hope<s%> were we <S%G4982>saved<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%> that is <S%G991>seen<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1680>hope<s%>: for1063, Acts1 who1679, 2532 hopeth <S%G1679>for<s%> that <S%G3739>which<s%> <S%G1679>he<s%> <S%G991>seeth<s%>?

But <S%G1161><s%> <S%G1487>if<s%> we hope <S%G1679>for<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> which we <S%G991>see<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, then do <S%G553>we<s%> <S%G1223>with<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> wait for <S%G553>it<s%>.

And in <S%G5615>like<s%> manner the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4878>helpeth<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G769>infirmity<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G5101>how<s%> to <S%G4336>pray<s%> <S%G2526>as<s%> we <S%G1163>ought<s%>; <S%G235>but<s%> the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> <S%G846>himself<s%> maketh <S%G5241>intercession<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> with <S%G4726>groanings<s%> which cannot be <S%G215>uttered<s%>;

and <S%G1161><s%> he that <S%G2045>searcheth<s%> the <S%G2588>hearts<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G5427>mind<s%> of the <S%G4151>Spirit<s%>, <S%G3754>because<s%> he maketh <S%G1793>intercession<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> the <S%G40>saints<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> the will of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

And <S%G1161><s%> we <S%G1492>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> to them that <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%> work <S%G4903>together<s%> <S%G1519>for<s%> <S%G18>good<s%>, even to them that <S%G5607>are<s%> <S%G2822>called<s%> according <S%G2596>to<s%> his <S%G4286>purpose<s%>.

For <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G4267>foreknew<s%>, <S%G4309>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4309>foreordained<s%> to be conformed <S%G4832>to<s%> the <S%G1504>image<s%> <S%G5207>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> might <S%G1511>be<s%> the <S%G4416>firstborn<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>:

and <S%G1161><s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G4309>foreordained<s%>, <S%G5128>them<s%> he <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G2564>called<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G2564>called<s%>, <S%G5128>them<s%> <S%G1344>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1344>justified<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> he <S%G1344>justified<s%>, <S%G5128>them<s%> <S%G1392>he<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G1392>glorified<s%>.

What <S%G5101><s%> <S%G3767>then<s%> shall <S%G2046>we<s%> <S%G2046>say<s%> <S%G4314>to<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%>? <S%G1487>If<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> is <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>, <S%G5101>who<s%> is <S%G2596>against<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%>?

He <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G5339>spared<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G3860>delivered<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G3860>up<s%> <S%G5228>for<s%> <S%G2257>us<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%>, <S%G4459>how<s%> shall <S%G5483>he<s%> <S%G3780>not<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> freely <S%G5483>give<s%> <S%G2254>us<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>?
Who <S%G5101><s%> shall lay anything to the <S%G1458>charge<s%> <S%G1588>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>'s <S%G1588>elect<s%>? It is <S%G2316>God<s%> that <S%G1344>justifieth<s%>;
who is he that condemneth? It is Christ Jesus that died, yea rather, that was raised from the dead, who is at the right hand of God, who also maketh intercession for us.

Who <S%G5101><s%> shall <S%G5563>separate<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ<s%>? shall <S%G2347>tribulation<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G4730>anguish<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1375>persecution<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3042>famine<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G1132>nakedness<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G2794>peril<s%>, <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3162>sword<s%>?

Even <S%G2531>as<s%> it is <S%G1125>written<s%>, <S%G3754>For<s%> <S%G4675>thy<s%> <S%G1752>sake<s%> we are <S%G2289>killed<s%> <S%G3650>all<s%> the day <S%G2250>long<s%>; We were <S%G3049>accounted<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> <S%G4263>sheep<s%> for the <S%G4967>slaughter<s%>.
Nay <S%G235><s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> these <S%G5125>things<s%> we are more than <S%G5245>conquerors<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> him that <S%G25>loved<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%>.

For <S%G1063><s%> I am <S%G3982>persuaded<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3777>neither<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G746>principalities<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> things <S%G1764>present<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> things to <S%G3195>come<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G1411>powers<s%>,

nor <S%G3777><s%> <S%G5313>height<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G899>depth<s%>, <S%G3777>nor<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G2937>creature<s%>, shall be <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G5563>separate<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>, which <S%G3588>is<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G2257>our<s%> <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
